title: MINI - worldwide sales volume 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Sales in units has increased over the Year.
Sales in units is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Sales in units, of value 285060.0 was reached at Year 2011
Minimum Sales in units about 234175.0 was reached at Year 2010
